market_analyst.description: Provides an interface for Chinese stock market data.

news_analyst.description: News analyst can fetch content from specific news websites

_comments.usage: Set 'enabled: true' to activate MCP tools for specific analysts
_comments.env_vars: Use ${VAR_NAME} syntax to reference environment variables
_comments.transport: Use 'stdio' for local subprocess communication, 'streamable_http' for HTTP servers
